title: The Second Stranger
tagline: A masterful psychological thriller that will keep you guessing until the very last page.
description1: When Remie Yorke's daughter goes missing, she's forced to confront a terrifying truth: someone has been watching her family. As the investigation unfolds, Remie discovers that the person she thought she knew best might be the greatest stranger of all.
description2: A gripping exploration of trust, deception, and the secrets that lie within every family.
